HDG.LOG.content: [method, cut out the chaff, what cheapens] everything facile, trite & vacuous > send essence of man reeling (ins Wanken bringt), devastate him, if this dispensation becomes destiny [?] [wouldn’t this take us beyond Being?]

HDG.WL.content: everything spoken stems, in many ways, from unspoken (either not yet spoken or beyond reach of speaking) > so that which is spoken can appear cut off from speaking/speakers, but it alone offers (entgegenhält) what they attend to (verhalten), regardless of how they stay (aufhalten) w/in spoken/unspoken

HDG.WL.content: Heidegger will call the unity of language: Aufriss (design rift), name demands we see proper of language’s essence more clearly > [English translator offers etymology of “sign” in design, Latin signum, secare, to cut] riss like ritzen (carve), to cut a furrow in soil, open to seed/growth > Auf-riss the whole of the traits (Züge) that structures & prevails throughout (durchfügt) the open/freedom of language > Aufriss the drawing/outline (Zeichnung) of language, structure (Gefüge) of a show/indication (Zeigens) in which speakers/speaking, spoken/unspoken, are joined (verfugt)

HDG.OHF.content: covering up of soil from which which definition of human arose: logon exon, animal rationale [rational becomes the logical], Christian Dasein as person capable of knowing, human cut to the measure of faith (glaubensmässig vorbestimmt) as being-created (Geschaffensein) in image of God
